topics.title: ES6+ Modern JavaScript Features
topics.description: Learn modern JavaScript features - destructuring, spread operator, template literals, modules, and more

contents.title: ES6+ Overview
contents.content:
ES6 (ECMAScript 2015) introduced major improvements to JavaScript. Subsequent versions added more features.

Major ES6+ Features:
â€¢ let and const (block scope)
â€¢ Arrow functions
â€¢ Template literals
â€¢ Destructuring
â€¢ Spread and rest operators
â€¢ Default parameters
â€¢ Classes
â€¢ Modules (import/export)
â€¢ Promises
â€¢ Symbol
â€¢ Map and Set
â€¢ Iterators and generators

ES7+ Features:
â€¢ Async/await (ES2017)
â€¢ Object spread (ES2018)
â€¢ Optional chaining (ES2020)
â€¢ Nullish coalescing (ES2020)
â€¢ Array methods (ES2019+)

Why Learn Modern JavaScript?
â€¢ Cleaner, more readable code
â€¢ Better performance
â€¢ Industry standard
â€¢ Required for frameworks
â€¢ Improved developer experience

contents.title: Template Literals and Destructuring

examples.title: Spread and Rest Operators
examples.explanation: Spread operator expands arrays/objects, while rest operator collects multiple elements into an array.
